channel.title: Wifi on Aimer's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Wifi on Aimer's Blog

item.title: Auto Start Wifi Hotspot on Gnome
item.description: Edit and save file nmcli-hotspot.desktop on path /home/aimerneige/.config/autostart [Desktop Entry] Name=nmcli-hotspot Comment=Open HotSport With nmcli Exec=nmcli connection up Hotspot Terminal=true Type=Application
